TempFastMail is a self-hosted, disposable email inbox solution built with PHP and React. It allows users to quickly set up a temporary email address to receive and view messages, with automatic deletion after 48 hours for privacy.

Firefly III is a self-hosted personal finance manager designed to help users track income and expenses, manage budgets, and gain insight into their financial habits. It provides tools for budgeting, categorization, tagging, and offers various financial reports, all while ensuring user data privacy and control.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

PageIndex MCP is a server that exposes PageIndex, a vectorless, reasoning-based RAG system, directly to LLMs and agents. It allows platforms like Claude and Cursor to interact with document structure via tree indexing, eliminating the need for vector databases and enabling human-like information retrieval from long documents.

NetScan Pro is an interactive Bash-based network scanning tool that offers live host discovery, port scanning, traceroute, and ping tests. It is designed for network administrators and security professionals, providing a user-friendly interface with colorful outputs and visual elements for network reconnaissance and security assessment.
